attributes.action: Elect 300 Vote Leave Supporters to The Lords immediately on a temporary basis
attributes.background:
The Lords are blocking the road for the UK to leave the EU and also ruin any chance we have of getting a good deal by undermining the process at every turn.
As the majority of the Lords are PRO EU add an additional 300 Temporary PRO Brexit Lords to the house to ensure Leave Means Leave

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

Anyone can nominate someone for non-party political membership of the House of Lords. You can find out more here:

http://lordsappointments.independent.gov.uk/how-to-apply.aspx

If you want the House of Lords to be elected, you may wish to sign this petition: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/218019
